Package weka.gui.knowledgeflow

Class VisibleLayout

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
weka.gui.knowledgeflow.VisibleLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class VisibleLayout
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Panel that wraps a flow and makes it visible in the KnowledgeFlow, along with it's associated log panel
Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void executeFlow​(boolean sequential) throws WekaException

      Throws:
      WekaException - if a problem occurs
